meanings.definition: A single hypertext document on the World Wide Web that can incorporate text, graphics, audio, and video elements.
meanings.sent1: I found an interesting webpage about animals.
meanings.sent2: She designed a webpage for her online store.
meanings.sent3: The webpage with dancing cats made me smile.
meanings.sent4: Her webpage was a colorful canvas of information.
meanings.sent5: The webpage was like a digital book come to life.

meanings.sent1: The webpage loaded slowly due to heavy content.
meanings.sent2: He clicked on the webpage to read the article.
meanings.sent3: The webpage seemed to play hide and seek with the links.
meanings.sent4: The webpage was a tiny window into the vast internet world.
meanings.sent5: The webpage gleamed like a polished gem on the screen.
